intro: An incredible and amazing journey, again!
description:
Go on an exciting journey exploring the colorful landscapes of the world with this new adventure. Get ready to search for various objects, play exciting mini-games and collect souvenirs.

Treat yourself to a unique journey through 30 amazing and unforgettable places. 
You can visit majestic mountains, conquer deserts, immerse yourself in the beauty of forests, and enjoy the nature of national parks. 
The game will give you the opportunity to use your skills and knowledge to complete mini-games and find all the hidden objects.

The collector's edition includes:
- 10 additional locations
- 10 additional mini-games, as well as 12 puzzles for real fans
- Souvenir shop
